source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 853,121 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 328,891.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description:
Equip: When damaged below 30% health, gain a shield for 8 sec which absorbs up to 1.8 million damage.

This effect can only be triggered once every 4 min but is reduced by 12 sec per unique Algari gem color socketed.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 421 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 74,301 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 168,875.

Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 113,169 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.
Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.

name: Tabard of the Lightbringer

spells.description: Use: Suffuses the wearer with the Light. (30 Min Cooldown)

description: May you always bring light into dark places.
